name: Jewelbot Inc.
description: Developer of a technology-enabled bracelet designed to fuse fashion and technology for teenagers. The company's bracelet offers communication and sends personal alerts through customizable programming and coding, enabling teenage girls to communicate with their friends using lights and vibrations.
one_liner: Developer of a technology-enabled bracelet designed to fuse fashion and technology for teenagers. The company's bracelet offers communication and sends personal alerts through customizable programming and coding, enabling teenage girls to communicate with their friends using lights and vibrations.
